summary: Phase 1 Beta consolidated testing complete. All 33 backend API tests PASSED (100%). Frontend UI verified working: Registration with Age Gate & Geo-blocking, Cricket Predictions (Ball-by-Ball with 20 limit, Over Outcome, Match Winner), Shop/Redemption, Dashboard without Watch Ads.
critical_code_review_comments: All Phase 1 Beta features implemented correctly
Age Gate: DOB field with 18+ validation working
Geo-blocking: 6 blocked states (AP, TG, AS, OD, SK, NL) properly disabled in state dropdown
Feature flags API returning all expected flags including ball_by_ball_limit=20
Over Outcome predictions working (0-5, 6-10, 11-15, 16+, Wicket options)
Match Winner prediction working with 50 coin reward
Ball-by-Ball limit clearly shown as 'Limited to 20 per match'
Fantasy Players API returning players with correct constraints (11 players, 100 credits)
Dashboard has no Watch Ads references - CORRECT per scope

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All Phase 1 Beta UI features working

seed_data_creation: Created test_cricket@free11.com user with BETA01 invite code
